author: ashish
msg: Improvement in r1090228. By default the x_duplicate_window settings will remain commented out.

author: dkulp
msg: Add suppliments for isorelax and relaxngdatatype

author: ashish
msg: Bug fix(Hand merged changes from trunk r1090226). Adding support of x_duplicate_window that will help us not to see any duplicate authorization that can occur with customer in the predefined time limit. The time limit for this duplicate window is 120(2 minutes) - 28800 (8 hours). For more details please refer Authorize.net developer guide - Here is the screenshot for direct reference - http://oi55.tinypic.com/2ziah51.jpg. We have made this settings configurable so anyone can enable it if they are facing this issue on production instance.
